author: USA TODAY, John Bacon, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus live updates: Cuomo, Trump to meet at the White House; South Carolina moves to ease restrictions; immigration temporarily halted
description: Trump says he's temporarily suspending immigration to protect jobs; meanwhile, some states will start to loosen stay-at-home restrictions.
content:
Multiple states across the country have seen protests as stay-at-home orders meant to curb the spread of the coronavirus continue.
Wochit
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo will meet with President Trump Tuesday at the White House, a face-to-face encounter after so… [+8522 chars]
